algorithms.imageProcessing

Class ImageExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.Image
      • algorithms.imageProcessing.ImageExt

  • public class ImageExt
extends Image
    image specialized to hold CIE 1931 xy chromaticity coordinates (colors) and HSB colors populated on demand.
    Author:
    nichole

      • init

        Overrides:
        init in class Image

      • setRadiusForPopulateOnDemand

        public void setRadiusForPopulateOnDemand(int radius)
        set the block radius of other pixel color calculations when a pixel's colors are calculated (populated indirectly from a get method when the color has not yet been calculated). In other words, if radius is 0, only the specified pixel's color will be calculated, else if radius is 1 for example, the pixel colors of the 8 surrounding neighbors will also be calculated. By default, the instance has a radius of 1.
        Parameters:
        radius -
